vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in X_WALLET.Collect (patch_8.sol#26-36):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_8.sol#31-34)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Acc (patch_8.sol#32)
